: Your Compliance Week Trial
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for stopping by our booth at the IIA/GRC conference in Phoenix and signing up for a free 10-day Compliance Week trial. Hereâ€™s your log-in info:

I hope you take the time to review all of our resources, including our articles, databases, columns, blogs, and other critical information.
Three weekly email newsletters Monthly print magazine 24/7 access to our Web site, which includes articles, columns, guidance, nine years' of archives, and more More than a dozen research databases Free CPE credit from our on-demand library Expert commentary from exclusive writers like former FASB Chairman Robert Herz and others Our Resource Exchange, with checklists, surveys, and other tools used by peers at other subscribing companies And much more.
Best regards,
Donna O'Neill
Compliance Week | (617) 570-8617
